definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: However, since her return, Chapman has become something of a national hero.
sentences.chinese: 但是，自查普曼归国后，她几乎已是民族英雄。

sentences.english: This picture reminds me of one of our national heroes, Lin Zexu.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画让我想到了我们的一个民族英雄，林则徐。

sentences.english: He left a name in history as a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他作为民族英雄而名垂青史。

sentences.english: The national hero, Zhang Huangyan s deeds have definite historical records.
sentences.chinese: 民族英雄张煌言蒙难南田事迹，史志早有记载。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation has given birth to many national heroes and revolutionary leaders .
sentences.chinese: 中华民族孕育出了许多民族英雄和革命领袖。

sentences.english: Why Yang Liwei is called a national hero?
sentences.chinese: 为什么杨利伟被称为民族英雄？

sentences.english: National hero is the main eulogizing object in mythic epics and folk stories.
sentences.chinese: 民族英雄是神话史诗与民间故事歌颂传扬的主要对象。

sentences.english: Thee Chinese nation has given birth to many national heroes and revolutionary leaders.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族养育了很多民族英雄和革命领袖。

sentences.english: Saint Laurent was hailed as a national hero.
sentences.chinese: 圣洛朗，被誉为民族英雄。

sentences.english: The monument was dedicated to the memory of the national hero.
sentences.chinese: 这座碑是为纪念那位民族英雄而建造的。

sentences.english: A candidate, then, for elevation as England’s national hero?
sentences.chinese: 那么，他是英国民族英雄的人选吗？

sentences.english: She’s a national hero in Australia and she’s only 16.
sentences.chinese: 她俨然是澳大利亚的民族英雄，而且她仅有16岁。

sentences.english: Laden was the greatest national hero in Arab history.
sentences.chinese: 拉登是阿拉伯历史上伟大的民族英雄。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation has brought forth a lot of competent national heroes and revolutionary leaders.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族孕育了许多有才干的民族英雄和革命领袖。

sentences.english: The great national hero, Lin Zexu.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的民族英雄林则徐。

sentences.english: Peter H. L. Chang is a great patriot and national hero.
sentences.chinese: 张学良是伟大的爱国者和民族英雄。

definition: Yue Fei (1103-1142), Song dynasty patriot and general
lit. reputation will go down in history (idiom); fig. achievements will earn eternal glory
variant of 開國元勳|开国元勋, founding figure (of country or dynasty)/founding father/fig. also used of company, school etc
founding figure (of a country or dynasty)/founding father/fig. also used of company or school etc
